alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua; Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 6:25PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Alachua and northwestern Marion Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 625 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cross Creek to Williston. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Citra, Cross Creek, Micanopy, Reddick, McIntosh, Flemington, Lowell and Lochloosa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Western Alachua; Western Marion
